channel.title: How do a type with glow using "[glow=red,2,300][/glow]"?
channel.description: How do i type with glow for my signature using "[glow=red,2,300][/glow]" ?

item.title: How do a type with glow using "[glow=red,2,300][/glow]"?
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

oh you mean like [glow=red,2,300]this[/glow]

its like this [//glow=red,2,300words here[/glow//]

remove ths // //

Read full topic
